attributes.action: follow the example of German mail service Deutsche Post and reduce the Royal Mail's postage costs for books as they serve informational and educational purposes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As books serve informational and educational purposes their postage through Royal Mail should be cheaper than the cost of sending ordinary parcels and packages. In Germany, for example, the mail service Deutsche Post offers reduced rates for the postage of books, brochures, maps and sheets of music under the condition that no letters are added to the mailing.
